newsitem.title: USA: Nikko hires Gribbon as fixed income manager.
newsitem.headline: Nikko hires Gribbon as fixed income manager.

text.p: The Nikko Securities Co International Inc said it hired Thomas Gribbon as a senior vice president and co-general manager of its Fixed Income Division.

Gribbon will oversee Nikko International's Fixed Income Division with senior vice president and co-general manager Shiro Kaneko. Gribbon's primary responsibilities will be government securities, money market securities, and proprietary trading as well as the repo desk, Nikko said.

Kaneko will focus on trading of mortgage-backed securities and corporate Yankee bonds. In addition, he will continue to oversee the asset finance business of Nikko Financial Services, a sister company of Nikko International, it added.
Both Gribbon and Kaneko will work on new product development and report to co-president Timothy Cronin.
Senior vice president David Weaver will continue in his role as sales manager for all fixed income and report to Gribbon and Kaneko, the company said.
